Package com.android.sunuerico.newsapp

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BuildConfig
     
    NewsActivity
    NewsActivity is the main activity of the app.
    NewsAdapter
    Adapter for the list of news items.
    NewsLoaderFragment
    Loads a list of news by using an AsyncTask to perform the network request to the given URL.
    SettingsActivity
    SettingsActivity is the activity that allows the user to change the settings of the app such as the number of articles to display, the order of the articles and whether to show the news author or not.
    SettingsActivity.NewsPreferenceSettings
    This fragment shows the preferences for the first header.
